bibliographic-data.invention-title: SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR PURCHASE AND DISTRIBUTION MANAGING OF HOSPITAL ARTICLES

nplcit.text: Dong, A supply chain model of vendor managed inventory, 2002, Transportation Research Part E: Logistics and Transportation Review, Volume 38, Issue 2, Pages 75-95

abstract.p: There are provided a purchase and distribution management system and method for purchasing articles used in a hospital by proxy and managing the distribution of the articles, the purchase and distribution management system including: an interface part connecting an exclusive management device of the hospital, the device computerizing the articles in the hospital, to the purchase and distribution management system to be compatible with each other in such a way that a user is able to use the purchase and distribution management system by using only the exclusive management device without downloading a new program
a purchase application reception part receiving a purchase application for hospital articles from the user
a contract check part retrieving whether there exists a contract between the user and a provider for the articles

a contract generation part generating the contract between the user and the provider when there is no contract for the hospital articles for which purchase application is received as a result of the retrieving of the contract check part

a purchase order management part generating and sending a purchase order for the articles to the provider when there is the contract for the articles for which purchase application is received as the result of the retrieving of the contract check part or the contract is generated by the contract generation part

a distribution management part checking an amount of each article in stock in the hospital, generating a purchase application according to a result of the checking, and managing a delivery process of the article in the hospital

and a consignment stock management part allowing a certain amount of warehoused articles for consignment stock to be consigned to the provider to be stored and changing an amount of interim warehoused articles consigned to the provider according to a use of the user.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR PURCHASE AND DISTRIBUTION MANAGING OF HOSPITAL ARTICLES

abstract.p: A system and a method for purchasing and managing the distribution of hospital articles are provided to purchase and manage hospital articles by using a management devices in a hospital. An interface(201) connects a management device of a hospital to an article purchase and management system in order for a user to use the system, and a purchase application reception unit(203) receives a purchase application of hospital articles from a consumer. A contract checking unit(205) checks over whether or not the contract between a supplier and the consumer exists, and a contract generation unit(207) generates the contract between the supplier and the consumer if not. An order unit(209) generates an order form and supplies the form to the supplier if so. An article distribution management unit(215) confirms the inventories for each article and manages the delivery of the articles.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR PURCHASE AND DISTRIBUTION MANAGING OF HOSPITAL ARTICLES
SYSTÈME ET PROCÉDÉ DE GESTION D'ACHAT ET DE DISTRIBUTION D'ARTICLES HOSPITALIERS

abstract.p: There are provided a purchase and distribution management system and method for purchasing articles used in a hospital by proxy and managing the distribution of the articles, the purchase and distribution management system including: an interface part connecting an exclusive management device of the hospital, the device computerizing the articles in the hospital, to the purchase and distribution management system to be compatible with each other in such a way that a user is able to use the purchase and distribution management system by using only the exclusive management device without downloading a new program
a purchase application reception part receiving a purchase application for hospital articles from the user
a contract check part retrieving whether there exists a contract between the user and a provider for the articles

a contract generation part generating the contract between the user and the provider when there is no contract for the hospital articles for which purchase application is received as a result of the retrieving of the contract check part

a purchase order management part generating and sending a purchase order for the articles to the provider when there is the contract for the articles for which purchase application is received as the result of the retrieving of the contract check part or the contract is generated by the contract generation part

a distribution management part checking an amount of each article in stock in the hospital, generating a purchase application according to a result of the checking, and managing a delivery process of the article in the hospital

and a consignment stock management part allowing a certain amount of warehoused articles for consignment stock to be consigned to the provider to be stored and changing an amount of interim warehoused articles consigned to the provider according to a use of the user.

L'invention concerne un système et un procédé de gestion d'achat et de distribution pour l'achat d'articles utilisés dans un hôpital par un mandataire ainsi que pour la gestion de la distribution des articles, le système de gestion d'achat et de distribution comprenant: un élément d'interface reliant un dispositif de gestion exclusif de l'hôpital, le dispositif traitant par ordinateur les articles à l'hôpital, au système de gestion d'achat et de distribution pour qu'ils soient compatibles entre eux, de sorte qu'un utilisateur peut utiliser le système de gestion d'achat et de distribution par utilisation uniquement du dispositif de gestion exclusif sans télécharger un nouveau programme
un élément de réception de demande d'achat recevant une demande d'achat pour des articles hospitaliers en provenance d'un utilisateur
un élément de vérification de contrat recherchant s'il existe un contrat entre l'utilisateur et un fournisseur des articles

un élément de génération de contrat générant le contrat entre l'utilisateur et le fournisseur lorsqu'il n'existe aucun contrat pour les articles hospitaliers pour lesquels une demande d'achat est reçue à la suite de la recherche de l'élément de vérification de contrat

un élément de gestion d'ordre d'achat générant et envoyant un ordre d'achat pour les articles au fournisseur lorsqu'il existe un contrat pour les articles pour lesquels une demande d'achat est reçue à la suite de la recherche de l'élément de vérification de contrat ou lorsque le contrat est généré par l'élément de génération de contrat

un élément de gestion de distribution vérifiant une quantité de chaque article en stock à l'hôpital, générant une demande d'achat en fonction d'un résultat de la vérification, et gérant un processus de distribution de l'article à l'hôpital

et un élément de gestion de stock en consignation permettant qu'une certaine quantité d'articles entreposés pour un stock de consignation soit consignée au fournisseur pour être stockée et modifiant une quantité d'articles d'entreposage intermédiaire consignés au fournisseur en fonction d'une utilisation de l'utilisateur.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR PURCHASE AND DISTRIBUTION MANAGING OF HOSPITAL ARTICLES
SYSTÈME ET PROCÉDÉ DE GESTION D'ACHAT ET DE DISTRIBUTION D'ARTICLES HOSPITALIERS

a purchase application reception part receiving a purchase application for hospital articles from the user
a contract check part retrieving whether there exists a contract between the user and a provider for the articles

a contract generation part generating the contract between the user and the provider when there is no contract for the hospital articles for which purchase application is received as a result of the retrieving of the contract check part

a purchase order management part generating and sending a purchase order for the articles to the provider when there is the contract for the articles for which purchase application is received as the result of the retrieving of the contract check part or the contract is generated by the contract generation part

a distribution management part checking an amount of each article in stock in the hospital, generating a purchase application according to a result of the checking, and managing a delivery process of the article in the hospital

and a consignment stock management part allowing a certain amount of warehoused articles for consignment stock to be consigned to the provider to be stored and changing an amount of interim warehoused articles consigned to the provider according to a use of the user.
